newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil Cenbank bond rate rises to 2.621 pct.
newsitem.headline: Brazil Cenbank bond rate rises to 2.621 pct.

text.p: Brazil's benchmark overnight rate rose to 2.621 percent a month, from 2.606 percent last week, at today's 7.249 billion reais sale of 56-day Central Bank Bonds (BBC), dealers said.
The auction's result was in line with market expectations, they added.
The 56-day bonds will mature on December 18. Today's auction is expected to add 251 million reais to the banking system, with 7.5 billion reais in old bonds coming due Wednesday.
